backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control and many public types for trading, strategies, backtests, insights, settings, and portfolios.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Empty or placeholder stylesheet file with no content provided.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring Market Rotation Radar metadata, manifest link, and root app mount.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining Market Rotation Radar app name, theme, icons, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic install, fetch caching, and cache cleanup with versioned cache name.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring theme provider, data fetching, alert logic, dashboard layout, and toast rendering.
Component generating AI advisory text based on indicators and rendering a styled badge with tooltip.
Displays AI-generated crypto forecasts, accuracy summaries, and sensitivity controls based on selected coin and sparkline data.
frontend/src/components/AIInsightPanel.t: Computes and visualizes market-wide technical insights like sentiment, RSI conditions, and EMA trends.
frontend/src/components/AIOptimizerPanel: Shows optimizer metrics, accuracy rates, and AI learning insights derived from trade prediction analysis.
frontend/src/components/AlertHistoryPane: Loads, filters, displays, and exports historical alert events with search and type/date filters.
frontend/src/components/AlertOnboardingD: Guides users through enabling alert notifications and saves onboarding preferences.
frontend/src/components/AlertSettingsPan: Component providing UI controls for enabling alerts, configuring notification types, and saving user alert preferences.
frontend/src/components/AlertToast.tsx: Toast component that displays animated trade alert notifications with icons, titles, and dismissal behavior.
frontend/src/components/BacktestingPanel: Panel for running predefined trading strategy backtests on sparkline data and displaying performance metrics and charts.
frontend/src/components/CoinChart.tsx: Crypto chart component supporting line and candlestick views, technical indicators like EMA and RSI, and tooltip rendering.
frontend/src/components/CoinDetailDialog: Dialog showing detailed coin information including market data, charts, AI forecasts, and trading zone insights.
frontend/src/components/CorrelationHeatm: Renders a correlation heatmap for crypto assets, showing BTC correlations, divergences, and rotation signals. Uses generated matrices and UI cards to display metrics and visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/CryptoTable.tsx: Displays a sortable, searchable crypto table with pagination and smart entry/exit zone indicators. Integrates price formatting, confidence badges, and row selection handling.
frontend/src/components/DominanceMetrics: Shows BTC, ETH, USDT dominance and Total 3 market cap using styled metric cards. Provides formatted percentage and market cap summaries.
frontend/src/components/FilterControls.t: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying credits and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/ForecastAccuracy: Loads historical forecast data, computes accuracy scores, and renders accuracy badges and a predictions vs actuals line chart. Displays fallback UI when no history exists.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSensitiv: Provides radio controls for selecting forecast sensitivity modes with descriptive labels and multipliers. Wrapped in a styled card with icons and badges.
frontend/src/components/ForecastVerifica: Displays forecast accuracy metrics and charts by loading verification data for a selected crypto symbol. Shows overall accuracy, timeframe breakdowns, and prediction-vs-actual charts.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, tracked coins manager, and login button. Uses next-themes for light/dark mode switching.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error recovery. Clears React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceAnaly: Shows trading performance metrics and trends using mock data with various charts and tabs. Includes refresh and export controls.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceModeT: Toggles a high-performance mode that reduces UI load and updates stored performance settings. Displays active optimizations when enabled.
frontend/src/components/PineScriptStrate: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioSimulat: Manages a simulated trading portfolio with opening/closing positions, capital tracking, and metrics. Integrates RSI/EMA signals to assign signal strength on trade entry.
Displays top profit opportunities based on historical ROI zones and probability analysis. Renders detailed zone cards with prices, success rates, and metrics.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallHelp.t: Displays platform-specific instructions for installing the app as a PWA, detecting standalone mode and user platform.
frontend/src/components/ReadyToDump.tsx: Analyzes crypto data to score dump potential, generates commentary, and displays top bearish candidates with interaction support.
frontend/src/components/ReadyToPump.tsx: Computes pump potential scores for cryptocurrencies, provides AI commentary, and shows top bullish candidates selectable by the user.
frontend/src/components/RiskManagementPa: Shows portfolio risk metrics and allows configuring risk parameters using stored settings and live crypto data.
frontend/src/components/rotation/BucketS: Shows performance metrics for each rotation bucket including 24h change, BTC-relative strength, and breadth.
frontend/src/components/rotation/FlowLea: Filters and ranks coins by performance, volume, BTC-relative change, and correlation, showing leaders and laggards.
frontend/src/components/rotation/HowToUs: Provides a dialog explaining rotation buckets, phases, confidence scores, and how to use flow and leader tools.
frontend/src/components/rotation/Rotatio: Placeholder panel showing past rotation alerts, currently empty with no stored history.
Settings panel allowing users to configure rotation alert notifications and threshold values.
Displays the current market rotation phase with confidence, explanation, and key signals, falling back to an alert if no phase is available.
Computes bucket classifications, metrics, and rotation phase to render the full market rotation dashboard with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/ScanControlPanel: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SensitivityContr: Controls signal sensitivity via thresholds, presets, and live stats, saving settings and emitting threshold changes.
frontend/src/components/SettingsControlC: Provides a settings overview card with access to help content and other configuration panels.
frontend/src/components/SignalPerformanc: Computes and displays performance metrics for EMA and RSI-based signals, with selectable categories and detailed coin lists in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/StrategyCard.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Provides a mounted-safe theme toggle button that switches between light and dark modes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/TopSignals.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/Total3Chart.tsx: Renders a card visualizing BTC, ETH, and Total3 market cap distribution with percentage bars and metrics.
frontend/src/components/TrackedCoinsMana: Manages user-selected tracked coins with localStorage persistence, search, and preference initialization.
frontend/src/components/TradeEntryZonePa: Displays active and projected long/short entry and exit zones with filtering, dialogs, and confidence indicators.
frontend/src/components/TradeJournalAnal: Loads trade journal analytics and displays key metrics, charts, and performance summaries.
frontend/src/components/WhaleTrackerPane: Displays whale movement activity by analyzing sparklines and listing top accumulation or distribution events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlertSystem.ts: Tracks trading zone signals and triggers browser notifications, sounds, and history entries while preventing duplicate alerts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login, clear, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching crypto data and managing user positions, strategies, profiles, and settings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRotationRadarSetti: Fetches, updates, and resets user rotation radar settings using the backend actor with local defaults when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables, base styles, touch utilities, and UI component styling overrides.
frontend/src/lib/aiOptimizer.ts: Implements tracking, updating, and evaluating AI trading signal outcomes with stored metrics and adaptive threshold logic.
frontend/src/lib/alertSystem.ts: Manages alert preferences, history, and cooldowns for trade confidence signals using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/backtesting.ts: Provides a historical backtesting engine for trading strategies, storing results and calculating performance metrics.
frontend/src/lib/binanceApi.ts: Empty placeholder for Binance API integration.
frontend/src/lib/coinCapApi.ts: Empty placeholder for CoinCap API integration.
frontend/src/lib/coinGeckoApi.ts: Empty placeholder for CoinGecko API integration.
frontend/src/lib/coinRankingApi.ts: Defines CoinRanking data interfaces and optimized fetching with caching for top cryptocurrencies and market metrics.
frontend/src/lib/correlationAnalysis.ts: Computes correlations, divergences, and rotation signals between crypto assets based on price sparklines.
frontend/src/lib/debug.ts: Provides optional debug logging utilities controlled by a single flag.
frontend/src/lib/forecastEngine.ts: Defines forecasting models and computes technical indicators like MACD, EMA, momentum, and generates timeframe-based crypto forecasts.
frontend/src/lib/performanceMode.ts: Manages performance mode settings with localStorage, controlling animations, caching, polling, and refresh intervals.
frontend/src/lib/portfolioSimulation.ts: Handles virtual trading by storing positions, capital, and PnL, and provides functions to open, close, and track simulated trades.
frontend/src/lib/profitZones.ts: Computes support/resistance, ROI probabilities, profit ranges, and risk metrics for identifying profit zones in crypto prices.
frontend/src/lib/riskManagement.ts: Provides risk parameter storage and calculates position sizing, stop loss, take profit, ATR, and support/resistance levels.
frontend/src/lib/rotationBuckets.ts: Classifies cryptocurrencies into rotation buckets (BTC, ETH, Majors, Mid-caps, Micro-caps) based on market cap rankings.
frontend/src/lib/rotationMetrics.ts: Calculates performance, momentum, breadth, and volume trend metrics for each rotation bucket relative to BTC.
frontend/src/lib/rotationPhase.ts: Infers the market rotation phase using BTC, ETH, majors, and mid-cap performance with hysteresis to avoid rapid switching.
frontend/src/lib/sensitivityControl.ts: Manages sensitivity settings, thresholds, and filtering of trading opportunities with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/lib/technicalIndicators.ts: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/lib/tradeEntryZone.ts: Defines entry, exit, short, and cover zone signal structures and includes indicator calculations like EMA and MACD with history tracking.
frontend/src/lib/tradeJournalAnalytics.t: Handles creation, updating, and analytics of trade journal entries synced with alerts and closed positions.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions for class merging and formatting currency, percentages, and large numbers.
frontend/src/lib/whaleTracker.ts: Detects and analyzes whale accumulation or distribution activity based on price and volume patterns, storing recent movements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that fetches crypto data, applies filtering and metrics, and renders many analytical panels and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/StrategyLibrary.tsx: Placeholder or empty page for a strategy library feature.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the Market Rotation Radar app, its features, requirements, and metadata.
